Message.Text: Hey Tommy, are you excited about the conference? I think they mentioned something about all the beer they’ll have there.
Yeah, I mean, beer is great, but did they really say how much? I thought it was more of a tech event.
I thought so too! But then someone mentioned a beer tasting session. Is that normal for a conference?
I have no idea! I’ve never been to one like that. Are we even supposed to drink that much?
And what about sharing a room? I’m not sure how that’ll work with all the drinking.
Right? Like, do we have to stay sober? Or just kind of keep it together? This sounds confusing.
Exactly! I thought sharing a room would be fun, but now I'm not so sure.
Maybe we should just stick to one beer each? Or is that even possible?
Who knows? Maybe we'll figure it out once we get there!
